ai-tika-s0305t10:81_7: There is no difference between one (birth) Freedom.
ai-tika-s0305t10:83_0: gets the reincarnation of the paths is said: “He recipient, and gets the fruition of the path!”
ai-tika-s0305t10:84_0: The color of ghee is finished.
ai-tika-s0305t10:87_0: Since he is exceedingly pure, he makes them illuminate for the sake of (of them) in the Mahātittha seized by which a great (of the two Sages), after which he was like the intention of (the Bodhisatta).
ai-tika-s0305t10:87_1: it is recorded that while the rest is reckoned.
ai-tika-s0305t10:89_0: The Linked Discourses on Stream-Entry is finished.
